title: Advanced Data-Driven Art Design Education Quality Management Program

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Course strengthening social domain-linked competencies for students/job seekers, utilizing real-time collaboration tools in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and explain three or more factors influencing educational quality (instructional design, digital integration, feedback systems)
Learners statistically interpret student satisfaction survey data (standard deviation, mean, p-value) and propose improvement strategies
Learners can restructure an instructional design process using Delphi technique-based expert consensus into five or more stages
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
